description: US President Donald Trump labelled Democrats 'kamikaze' as the US government shutdown, now the longest in history, enters its sixth week. A dispute over healthcare spending fuels the deadlock, with both parties showing little willingness to compromise, threatening further chaos.

title: After $12.6 billion Amazon stake cut, Jeff Bezos' ex-wife MacKenzie Scott makes one of her biggest donations
description: MacKenzie Scott has gifted Howard University a remarkable $80 million, one of its largest donations ever, bolstering diversity and equity initiatives. This substantial, unrestricted contribution will aid student aid, infrastructure, and operations, arriving at a crucial time for the institution. Scott's ongoing philanthropic spree includes significant gifts to other DEI causes and a reduction in her Amazon holdings.

title: Lakers legend praises Bronny James after strong game vs Trail Blazers
description: Bronny James showcased a standout performance for the Los Angeles Lakers against the Portland Trail Blazers, contributing five points and six assists. Lakers legend James Worthy lauded the young guard's game, calling it potentially his best yet. Coach JJ Redick also praised Bronny's defensive intensity and physicality, highlighting his significant contributions in a crucial fourth-quarter stretch.

title: William Nylander opens up on his frustration and Maple Leafs’ struggles
description: William Nylander expressed his frustration with being sidelined due to injury, admitting the waiting game is wearing him down. His absence has impacted the Maple Leafs' offense and overall rhythm. Despite playing limited games, Nylander remains a crucial scorer, and his premature return could jeopardize the team's playoff aspirations.
